code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';var selectCart=function selectCart(state){return state.card;};export var selectCartItems=createSelector([selectCart],function(card){return card.cardItems;});export var selectCountItems=createSelector([selectCartItems],function(cardItems){return cardItems.reduce(function(acc,cardItem){return acc+cardItem.quantity;},0);});export var selectCountItemsTotal=createSelector([selectCartItems],function(cardItems){return cardItems.reduce(function(acc,cardItem){return acc+cardItem.quantity*cardItem.price;},0);});export var selectCartHidden=createSelector([selectCart],function(card){return card.hidden;});
